outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: Develop and implement innovative approaches to local economic development (LED) to increase economic activity in the agricultural sector, with particular regard to gender development and empowerment. 

Output 2: Develop and implement an equitable, economical, efficient and effective LG development planning and public expenditure management (PEM) system to increase local development, with particular regard to the most disadvantaged locations and population groups. 

Output 3: Achieve policy, legal and regulatory improvements through lessons learnt, to support Outputs 1 and 2, thus giving emphasis to LED in 1, planning and PEM in 2, and gender development through 1 and 2.
